TopicTitle: Looking for old parts-forgot to back them up

Articles.Content:
Does anyone still have a copy of the old precooler, engine nacelle, and radial air intake parts?

I did not make a copy of them before I updated.

So I like to re-use old parts for simple mods. I was using the basic jet from 0.18 +.cfg file text editing to make an electric fan part. I remembered to back up the basic jet, turboramjet, and mk1 cockpit parts... but I was still using the 1.04 stock models for intakes (supplying a resource different than Intake air, that worked anywhere there was an atmosphere).

Now I'd like to use the old precooler/engine nacelle/radial intake so my electric fan parts are visually distinct from current stock parts.

Can anyone send me the zipped part folders?
I could, but I would want an OK from Squad. It might be verboten.
Time for a new official mod? KSP Legacy Parts? But who will maintain that lot later on?!

I thought someone already did that for the 0.13 parts? that obviously didn't get maintained

If you bought KSP from the shop you should be able to get older versions from there.

If you bought KSP from the shop you should be able to get older versions from there.

That also works on Steam, which allows you to go back to the previous major version (which in this case is probably still .90).

You do it via the opt-in for beta and development versions in the game properties in the library.
We don't mind people using the old KSP parts to make mod packs with. Of course, any use of them that is not related to KSP is a different story.
Anyone got a set of the old air intakes then? From 0.24 or so the black ones

Anyone got a set of the old air intakes then? From 0.24 or so the black ones

I'm still on 0.25 at home. Gimme a few days to drag my laptop to work.

There's already a mod for this guys-

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99020-1-0-4-Kerbal-Historical-Institute-presents-Original-KSP-Parts-3-3-27-06-15

- - - Updated - - -

Note- it may pickup the old pre 1.0.5 parts in a little bit. The update just got released, give it a few days and it should get those old 1.0.4 parts in too.

There's already a mod for this guys-

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99020-1-0-4-Kerbal-Historical-Institute-presents-Original-KSP-Parts-3-3-27-06-15

- - - Updated - - -

Note- it may pickup the old pre 1.0.5 parts in a little bit. The update just got released, give it a few days and it should get those old 1.0.4 parts in too.

There aren't any recent posts in the thread, so right now it's hard to know whether they intend to add more recently retired parts.

I wouldn't mind seeing a pack that has just the parts/assets that were retired or replaced within this past year, such as the rectangular black air intake, the older Mk1 jet cockpit, etc. I still have copies of all of that stuff, going back to 0.24 (for some reason I didn't save backups of installed versions before that), BTW.

In the case of the air intake, either we'd have to keep its historical stats and hope it works well enough, or give it some new stats based on the new intakes and the new aerodynamics.

They will and worst case scenario the owner of the IWNO mod will reupload his mod for 1.0.5 and add a pre1.0.5 parts. I can tell him and he'll have it done if you guys need it.

It's just the Mk1 parts and the two engines, right?

https://www.dropbox.com/s/zbhdqhgcwt920ux/KSP104LegacyParts.zip?dl=0
